plugin.name: Redirects
general.form.errors.url: Field should be a relative url.

overview.table.actions.edit.label: Edit
overview.table.actions.delete.label: Delete
modal.import.partial.message: Some data failed to be imported. This is most likely due to duplicate redirects. Please check the log for more information.
modal.import.success.message: Your data has been imported successfully.
modal.import.error.message: An unexpected error occured while importing your data.
detail.header.title: Edit redirect
detail.form.from.label: From
detail.form.to.label: To
detail.form.type.label: Type
detail.form.submit.title: Save
detail.form.submit.new.title: Save and new
detail.form.type.value.permanent.descrip: 301: A permanent redirect. The browser will cache this redirect, so upon removing many users will still be redirected.
detail.form.type.value.temporary.descrip: 302: Temporary redirect. This redirect will NOT be cached by the browser, when removed the old link will be available again.
Duplicate redirect. Redirect with the same 'From' field already exists.
detail.form.save.notify.error.LOOP.messa: Redirect will cause a loop. The given 'To' field will eventually loop back to the 'From' field.
